summary: Hey uhhh. Let people post what they damn want to on their own blog because it’s their own blog, especially when they aren’t even...
body: Hey uhhh. Let people post what they damn want to on their own blog because it’s their own blog, especially when they aren’t even tagging anything. Don’t like it? You don’t have to go on it. It’s as simple as that really. Really it seriously is so easy. Ik I’ve disagreed with people but I never told them what they should and shouldn’t post on their blog. Don’t try to tell people what they should and shouldn’t post on their blog. That’s absolutely ridiculous.

summary:

TJ: I think it's "converse"
Buffy: Huh?
TJ: Just say...
body:
Buffy: I’m not going to conversate with you, I’m not going to invest time-

TJ: I think it’s “converse”

Buffy: Huh?

TJ: Just say “talk”

blog.name: mywholehistoryintheam
blog.title: two of us
blog.description:
Diana 
| 19 | Hufflepuff
| Andi Mack and SVU took my life | soon PLL: The Perfectionists will take my life too | I'm in love with Sonny Carisi | Tyrus owns my blog | sometimes SVU owns my blog too | 'mackscenes' on instagram | 'Mack S' on youtube

summary: What’s the perfect song for Muffy?

body:
sunflowers (pt. 2)

“… And then I asked for the bracelet back. It’s gonna go in the my memory box that Bex made for me, and I’m done. Me and Jonah can finally be friends without all the unnecessary dra-” Andi stopped talking.

She glanced at Cyrus beside her who’s jaw has dropped.

“I didn’t know they were talking again,” Andi noticed. She awaited a response from Cyrus. “Did you?”

Cyrus shook his head.

Ahead of them stood Buffy and Marty, bantering as if nothing had changed. Buffy nudged Marty in the shoulder as they headed on over towards Cyrus and Andi.

“Hey, Cyrus. Andi. What’s up?” Marty asked, casually.

Andi and Cyrus exchanged a look. “Not much,” Andi replied.

“Um, I’ll see you tonight, I guess,” Buffy nudged Marty away.

“See you tonight, 11.8.”

Buffy smiled.

“Tonight?” Cyrus and Andi asked in unison.

Buffy nodded, wistfully. “We’re going on a date. It’s not a big deal, and don’t you guys get over excited about it. The amount of pressure you guys put on me about having crushes is bad enough,” Buffy laughed, thinking of a certain thing in particular. “Hell, if you guys hadn’t pushed me, I certainly wouldn’t have gone after Walker. And certainly wouldn’t have ‘broken up’ with Marty in the first place.”

Cyrus and Andi sighed. “You’re right.”

“So don’t make a big deal out of this. We’re just going to Waffle House after the track meet and it’s going to be a date. That’s it.”

Cyrus and Andi exchanged a look. That’s it.

Andi’s heart sank. Something about the words that’s it hurt for some reason. A part of her felt a twinge of joy about them going to Waffle House, instead of the Spoon. The Spoon was for Buffy, Andi, and Cyrus, not for Buffy and Marty.

“Gosh, I remember when you, Jonah, Buffy, and Marty went on that virtual date. That was a disaster. But this… I think this will make Buffy happy. I feel so happy for her. Don’t you?”

No. Andi knew she had to lie. “Yes because Marty really cares about her and he’ll make her happy. And besides, they’re sooo cute together.” Andi made sure to exaggerate enough excitement into her voice. 

“Ooh. Have we decided on a ship name?” Cyrus asked, starting to blurt out combinations of Marty and Buffy, Driscoll and From the Party.

Andi adjusted her backpack straps and gave an excuse to Cyrus before she hurried down the hallways. She needed to be away from Cyrus and definitely away from Buffy.

Instinctively, she pulled out her phone. Andi smiled sadly towards the wallpaper. Her and Buffy from the day she gave Jonah the bracelet for the… Was it the third time? Andi could barely keep track anymore.

But they were broken up now. Thankfully. And now, Buffy was gonna get a boyfriend. Cyrus was with TJ. Walker was barely in her life anymore, for they hadn’t talked much since her and Jonah started using labels.

When Andi got home, she felt the need to craft. Another bracelet. But in her gut, it wasn’t about Jonah or about confusion about feelings for Jonah.

She started humming a tune.

Sunflower.

She’d always loved the song, but now whenever she sang it, it felt like she was singing to someone. Not Jonah, Not Walker. The boys they noticed her, hell she had to pick them, not the other way around.

Andi pulled out a piece of paper and one of her pencils, beginning to draw.

Buffy with a sunflower in her hand, her lips about to move as if she was going to ask a question. Going to ask Andi a question. 

Andi scooted away from the table, the gears in her mind spinning. 

The realization came to her. All the times cuddling with Buffy, the resting heads on her shoulder, the cheering at all her games, the desire to always be close to Buffy. The jealousy over Marty and Buffy going on a real date.

Andi kept her voice low. “I… like… Buffy?”

Her voice made it sound like a question, one that Andi already knew the answer to. I like Buffy.

This was the last thing Andi Mack needed right now. A crush.

blog.name: spaceotter42
blog.title: Tomorrow Starts Today
blog.description: An Andi Mack Journey and other things Disney Channel

title: Description of “The Boys Are Back”
body:
Andi Mack Season 3, Episode 1, October 8, 2018

Source:  Andi Mack Wiki

After a tearful goodbye between the title character and her longtime crush Jonah, the season 3 premiere, titled “The Boys Are Back,” finds Andi unsure about her feelings for the Ultimate Frisbee player as she waits for him to return from summer camp.  Things become even more complicated on the love front when the young teen finds out who her best friend Buffy is dating.  Meanwhile, Andi, Bex, and Celia are thrilled when beloved family members make surprise returns to Shadyside.

reblog.comment:
Andi Mack Season 3, Episode 1, October 8, 2018

Source:  Andi Mack Wiki

After a tearful goodbye between the title character and her longtime crush Jonah, the season 3 premiere, titled “The Boys Are Back,” finds Andi unsure about her feelings for the Ultimate Frisbee player as she waits for him to return from summer camp.  Things become even more complicated on the love front when the young teen finds out who her best friend Buffy is dating.  Meanwhile, Andi, Bex, and Celia are thrilled when beloved family members make surprise returns to Shadyside.

trail.content_raw:
Andi Mack Season 3, Episode 1, October 8, 2018

Source:  Andi Mack Wiki

jandi headcanons for anon

double dates with tuffy

jonah asks andi to hoemcoming by riting it on a frisbee and throwing jt to her

andi rejoins the firsbee team and becoms a pro and joanh gets really happy and gives her bunchs of hugs

andi makes jonah a new braclet every time they have a disaggrement becauz she feels bad and wants jonah to kniw she luvs him lots !!!
